text: Nikolay Domakinov (; born 11 July 1980) is a Bulgarian football defender. ==International career== Domakinov played in two matches on the Bulgaria national football team in 2005 - with Ecuador and Mexico. At the time he participated in the tour of the Bulgaria national football team in North America. {| class="wikitable" |+ Nikolay Domakinov: International Matches ! # !! Date !! Venue !! Opponent !!
